wikipedia_page.main: Robert Henry Bow FRSE (1827–1909) was a Scottish civil engineer and photographer.

response: * Robert Henry Bow (1827–1909), civil engineer and photographer
* Robert Henry Bow FRSE (1827-1909) photographic pioneer and civil engineer
The firm undertook design, construction and manufacture of the ironwork for the Deepdale viaduct (b.1857-1860) on the Stainmore Railway Company to a design of Thomas Bouch and Robert Henry Bow.
*Robert Henry Bow (1827–1909), Scottish civil engineer and photographer
